translations: n.（尤指战争中的）大屠杀，残杀；艰难的局势

phrs.translation: 杀戮, 残杀, 大量绝灭
原始杀戮, 原始杀害
暴虐赛车, 激斗赛车
时空猎杀者, 时光猎杀者
横冲直撞之终极杀戮, 终极战争

sentences.sentence: Take it as you will: a smorgasbord of vehicular carnage or a condensed physics lesson.
sentences.translation: 如果你喜欢的话：去吃一次汽车相撞的大餐或是听一次精简的物理课。

sentences.sentence: Most of the carnage came two hours later, in a different building filled with classrooms.
sentences.translation: 两小时后在一所教学楼内，更大的悲剧发生了。

sentences.sentence: When was the last time you heard an anti-nuclear campaigner drawing attention to this daily carnage?
sentences.translation: 你什么时候听说过那些反核主义者提到过这些日常惨剧？
